title: Lollapalooza 2025 Lineup Announced: Tyler, the Creator, Sabrina Carpenter, A$AP Rocky, and More
description: Olivia Rodrigo, Rüfüs Du Sol, Luke Combs, Twice, A$AP Rocky, Korn, Gracie Abrams, Doechii, and others will perform at the Chicago festival in the summer
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Olivia Rodrigo, Rüfüs Du Sol, Luke Combs, Twice, A$AP Rocky, Korn, Gracie Abrams, Doechii, and others will perform at the Chicago festival in the summer
text: Lollapalooza’s 2025 lineup is here. Headlining the event are: Olivia Rodrigo, Tyler, the Creator, Sabrina Carpenter, Rüfüs Du Sol, Luke Combs, the K-pop group Twice, A$AP Rocky, and Korn. Elsewhere on the bill are: Gracie Abrams, Doechii, Clairo, Djo, Mk.gee, Finneas, Magdalena Bay, Isaiah Rashad, the Blessed Madonna, Ravyn Lenae, Bladee, Kenny Mason, Matt Champion, Rebecca Black, Nourished by Time, Dua Saleh, Overmono, Xaviersobased, Star Bandz, and many others. See the 2025 Lollapalooza lineup in the poster blow.Lollapalooza takes place from Thursday, July 31, to Sunday, August 3, at Chicago’s Grant Park. Tyler, the Creator was meant to be a headliner at the 2024 festival, but he had to cancel his appearance.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
html:
Lollapalooza’s 2025 lineup is here. Headlining the event are: Olivia Rodrigo, Tyler, the Creator, Sabrina Carpenter, Rüfüs Du Sol, Luke Combs, the K-pop group Twice, A$AP Rocky, and Korn. Elsewhere on the bill are: Gracie Abrams, Doechii, Clairo, Djo, Mk.gee, Finneas, Magdalena Bay, Isaiah Rashad, the Blessed Madonna, Ravyn Lenae, Bladee, Kenny Mason, Matt Champion, Rebecca Black, Nourished by Time, Dua Saleh, Overmono, Xaviersobased, Star Bandz, and many others. See the 2025 Lollapalooza lineup in the poster blow.

Lollapalooza takes place from Thursday, July 31, to Sunday, August 3, at Chicago’s Grant Park. Tyler, the Creator was meant to be a headliner at the 2024 festival, but he had to cancel his appearance.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
